programme.title: Men's Gold Medal Match FIN vs ROC - Ice Hockey | Olympic Winter Games Beijing 2022
programme.desc: This event took place on 20/02/2022 at the National Indoor Stadium. Final Score: FIN 2:1 ROC. Finland claimed the gold medal while ROC won silver. Slovakia took home the bronze medal.

programme.title: Women's Gold Medal Match GBR vs JPN - Curling | Olympic Winter Games Beijing 2022
programme.desc: This event took place on 20/02/2022 at the Nat. Aquatics Ctr - Sheet B. Final Score: GBR 10:3 JPN. Great Britain claimed the gold medal. Japan won silver and Sweden took home the bronze.

programme.title: Women's Giant Slalom Run 1 - Alpine Skiing | Olympic Winter Games Beijing 2022
programme.desc: This event took place on 07/02/2022 at the Nat Alpine Ski Ctr - Technical. Sara Hector (SWE) set the fastest time with 57.56, Katharina Truppe (AUT) came second and Federica Brignone (ITA) finished third.

programme.title: Identify
programme.desc: The inspiring journey of five transgender athletes and how sport helped them find their true identity.

programme.title: Women's Bronze Medal Match FIN v SUI - Ice Hockey | Olympic Winter Games Beijing 2022
programme.desc: This event took place on 16/02/2022 at the Wukesong Sports Centre. Final Score: FIN 4:0 SUI.

programme.title: Women's 1500 m - Speed Skating | Olympic Winter Games Beijing 2022
programme.desc: This event took place on 07/02/2022 at the National Speed Skating Oval. Ireen Wust (NED) defended her title in the 1500m setting an olympic record of 1:53.28. Takagi Miho (JPN) claimed Silver with a time of 1:53.72, followed by Antoinette de Jong (NED) who came third with 1:54.82 and took a Bronze medal.

programme.title: Women's 4x5 km Relay - Cross-Country Skiing | Olympic Winter Games Beijing 2022
programme.desc: This event took place on 12/02/2022 at the Zhangjiakou Crs-Ctry Ctr. ROC claimed the Gold, Germany won the Silver and Sweden completed the podium with the Bronze.

programme.title: The Force Ice Hockey Team
programme.desc: Team Canada Olympic hero Daniele Sauvageau travels to Wichita, USA to try to turn around the fortunes of a struggling ice hockey team.

programme.title: Fitness Influencers vs Winter Olympians
programme.desc: Fitness-minded social influencers are paired with ice hockey player Rebecca Johnston, curler Kaitlyn Lawes and snowboarder Alex Deibold to see if they can keep up with an Olympian’s intense workouts.

programme.title: Women's Big Air Final - Freestyle Skiing | Olympic Winter Games Beijing 2022
programme.desc: This event took place on 08/02/2022 at the Big Air Shougang. Ailing Eileen Gu (CHN) won her first Olympic Gold medal in women's freestyle skiing with a total score of 188.25. Tess Ledeux (FRA) claimed Silver with a score of 187.50 and Mathilde Gremaud (SUI) took the Bronze with 182.50.

programme.title: Women's Super-G - Alpine Skiing | Olympic Winter Games Beijing 2022
programme.desc: This event took place on 11/02/2022 at the Nat Alpine Ski Ctr - Speed. Lara Gut-Behrami (SUI) was the fastest skier in the Women’s Alpine Super-G claiming the gold medal with a time of 1:13.51. Mirjam Puchner (AUT) nabbed the silver after finishing in a time of 1:13.73 and Michelle Gisin (SUI) scooped bronze with a time of 1:13.81.

programme.title: Women's 5000 m - Speed Skating | Olympic Winter Games Beijing 2022
programme.desc: This event took place on 10/02/2022 at the National Speed Skating Oval. Irene Schouten (NED) claimed the Gold while Isabelle Weidemann (CAN) won Silver and Martina Sablikova (CZE) completed the podium with the Bronze.

programme.title: Women's Singles Heats 3 & 4 - Luge | Olympic Winter Games Beijing 2022
programme.desc: This event took place on 08/02/2022 at the Yanqing Sliding Centre. Olympic champion Natalie Geisenberger (GER) won her fifth Olympic Gold medal with a best time of 3:53.454. Anna Berreiter (GER) picked up her first Olympic medal with Silver and Tatyana Ivanova (ROC) took the Bronze.

programme.title: Identify
programme.desc: The inspiring journey of five transgender athletes and how sport helped them find their true identity.

programme.title: Women's Cross Final - Snowboard | Olympic Winter Games Beijing 2022
programme.desc: This event took place on 09/02/2022 at the Genting Snow Park - P & X. Lindsey Jacobellis (USA) claimed Gold in her fifth Olympic Games, while Chloe Trespeuch (FRA) won Silver and Meryeta Odine (CAN) took Bronze.

programme.title: Short Track Speed Skating - Women's 1500m Final A | Beijing 2022 Replays
programme.desc: Relive the women's 1500m final at Beijing 2022

programme.title: Women's 7.5km Sprint - Biathlon | Olympic Winter Games Beijing 2022
programme.desc: This event took place on 11/02/2022 at the Zhangjiakou Biathlon Ctr. Marte Olsbu Roeiseland (NOR) claimed Gold, while Elvira Oeberg (SWE) won Silver and Dorothea Wierer (ITA) completed the podium with Bronze.

programme.title: Women's Gold Medal Match CAN vs USA - Ice Hockey | Olympic Winter Games Beijing 2022
programme.desc: This event took place on 17/02/2022 at the Wukesong Sports Centre. Final Score: CAN 3:2 USA.

programme.title: Women's Downhill - Alpine Skiing | Olympic Winter Games Beijing 2022
programme.desc: This event took place on 15/02/2022 at the Nat Alpine Ski Ctr - Speed. Corinne Suter (SUI) claimed the Gold, Sofia Goggia (ITA) Silver and Nadia Delago (ITA) completed the podium.

programme.title: Teenage duo Viladot & Wahlstrom driven by Olympic dream
programme.desc: Synchronised swimmer Georgina Viladot and ice hockey player Oliver Wahlstrom are only 15 but the Olympics are at the front of their minds.

programme.title: Women's Ski Cross Final - Freestyle Skiing | Olympic Winter Games Beijing 2022
programme.desc: This event took place on 17/02/2022 at the Genting Snow Park - P & X. Sandra Naeslund (SWE) claimed the gold medal, Marielle Thompson (CAN) took the silver, and Daniela Maier (GER) completed the podium.

programme.title: Mixed Relay - Biathlon | Olympic Winter Games Beijing 2022
programme.desc: This event took place on 05/02/2022 at the Zhangjiakou Biathlon Ctr. Norway won the Gold, while France claimed the Silver and the ROC team completed the podium.

programme.title: Olympic Outposts -Episode 1: A global journey to discover sports passions in the most unlikely places.
programme.desc: Journey to the opposite ends of the world as our hosts explore the basketball fever in Philippines, American football in the heart of Germany or the unlikely Ice hockey tradition in Australia.

programme.title: Hockey superstar raised on a farm searching for Olympic glory | Winter Tracks
programme.desc: Jenni Hiirikoski is regarded as one of the finest Ice Hockey players of her generation. She is the captain of Finland’s national team and a future Hall of Famer. Until she was a teenager, Jenni had to play with boys. Later whilst her teammates went on to the NHL, Jenni had to balance competing with working a day job despite being one of the best players ever. She now goes into her fourth Olympics in Beijing knowing it could be her last chance to achieve Olympic glory.

programme.title: Women's 500 m, Men's 1000 m & Mixed Team Finals - Short Track Speed Skating | Olympic Winter Games Beijing 2022
programme.desc: This event took place on 05/02/2022 at the Capital Indoor Stadium. At the Mixed Team Relay Final, it was China who claimed the Gold Medal, with Italy taking the Silver and Hungary the Bronze.

programme.title: Team Event - Men's Short, Rhythm Dance, Pairs Short Final - Figure Skating | Olympic Winter Games Beijing 2022
programme.desc: This event took place on 04/02/2022 at the Capital Indoor Stadium. Nathan Chen (USA) won the Men's Short Program with a score of 111.71. Madison Hubbell and Zachary Donohue (USA) achieved 1st place with a score of 86.56 in Rhythm Dance Competition. Wenjing Sui and Cong Han (CHN) won the Pairs Short Program with a score of 82.83. The results are provisional.

programme.desc: Synchronised swimmer Georgina Viladot and ice hockey player Oliver Wahlstrom are only 15 but the Olympics are at the front of their minds.

programme.title: Women's 7.5 km & 7.5 km Skiathlon - Cross-Country Skiing | Olympic Winter Games Beijing 2022
programme.desc: This event took place on 05/02/2022 at the Zhangjiakou Crs-Ctry Ctr. Therese Johaug (NOR) claimed the Gold, Natalia Nepryaeva (ROC) Silver and Teresa Stadlober (AUT) completed the podium.

programme.title: Mixed Relay - Biathlon | Olympic Winter Games Beijing 2022
programme.desc: This event took place on 05/02/2022 at the Zhangjiakou Biathlon Ctr. Norway won the Gold, while France claimed the Silver and the ROC team completed the podium.

programme.title: Women's 500 m, Men's 1000 m & Mixed Team Finals - Short Track Speed Skating | Olympic Winter Games Beijing 2022
programme.desc: This event took place on 05/02/2022 at the Capital Indoor Stadium. At the Mixed Team Relay Final, it was China who claimed the Gold Medal, with Italy taking the Silver and Hungary the Bronze.
